hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that The Prophet said:“If I were to order anyone to prostrate to anyone, then I would order the wife to prostrate to her husband.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حَقِّ الزَّوْجِ عَلَى الْمَرْأَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about the husband's rights over the wife
